attributes.action: Settle a person’s rights to abortion into law in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The overturning of legal precedent in USA highlights the fragility of relying on legal precedents and not establishing basic human rights into UK law, removing doubts and eliminating the ability to degrade our basic human rights in the face of growing right wing racism and religious zealots.
attributes.background: Settle a pregnant person’s right to abortion into UK law to protect our citizen’s basic human rights as outlined by the U.N.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

Include abortion rights in the Bill of Rights: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619334

Decriminalise abortion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619159
